boardgame.name: Razzia!
家族拍賣會
boardgame.description: A card game re-implementation of Knizia's earlier board game Ra with the only notable changes being the re-theme and lack of catastrophes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This time players are mafiosi bidding for the booty stolen the previous night. Cars, jewels, and even whole nightclubs are for sale!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round, players will take turns flipping over booty cards to see what is available for auction in this lot. Once a lot contains enough desirable items (or when a policeman card is revealed), players bid on the displayed items using the available cheques._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The round ends when all the cheques have been spent, or when enough policemen arrive to raid the building and put an end to the illegal auction. Players then score points according to what cards they have accumulated - some cards are discarded after scoring, while others remain in that player's collection for the following rounds. Whoever has the highest score after the third round is declared the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game comes with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 99 Booty cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 21 Policemen cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 16 Cheques_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 6 Scoring/Player aid cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 Board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 Rule booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.videogamebg: Reiner Knizia_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Razzia - The Mafia Board Game

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: first german edition +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa and canada : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for asia and australia: cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros
Shipping is 4.30$ within U.S, insurance 1.30$ opotional.

never played +++++ german version and german rules, but game parts are language independent and i am almost sure, that you can find a rules translation somewhere on the net +++++ will be shipped with insurance only +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ if you want to use paypal, please ask before, if any paypal commission has to be included in the transaction (for non-euro countries for example, in most cases this could be about 4 to 4,5%) +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance
New in shrink wrap. Only actual shipping costs will be charged. Contact me about shipping costs.

We are selling and shipping to the following countries: Germany - 4,00 Euro shipping Austria, BeNeLux - 7,00 Euro shipping Denmark - 8,00 Euro shipping France - 10,00 Euro shipping Italy - 13,00 Euro shipping Great Britain - 15,00 Euro shipping Shipping is only once - it depends NOT on the number of games you will order! Payment can be made by international bank transfer(free for you) with IBAB _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; BIC or with Paypal(+4,5% fees!!) Please not that nearly all games have german rules!

Razzia! complete and in excellent condition. Shipping is $5. Payment via cashiers check, money order or non-credit card PayPal (ie funds transfer).

COULD BE SEND AS A LETTER (CHEAPER,FASTER) DISCOUNT RULES: IF YOU BUY 3 OR MORE GAMES YOU´LL GET DISCOUNT. THE PERCENTAGE IS (DAY+MONTH)/2 (Example: If you buy the games on 12th June you´ll get 12+6=18/2=9 %). So you can get a max. Discount on 31th december of 21 % :_). The date is the BGG-TIME (CST). I´m selling a lot of other german boardgames Shipping worldwide (Paypal or cash or Western Union). Bank Transfer is also OK, if there are no further costs for me. BRANDNEW: I´m offering the beautiful German re-make of Knizia´s masterpiece as an easy-to-carry cardgame. Mint condition (still in shrink-wrap!)
I´m just beginning to break up my boardgame collection, so perhaps you can find a real bargain! All items are in perfect condition (see description) and come from a non-smoking environment. Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays actual postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: Cash, PayPal (no credit cards!) or chargefree EU-bank transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT). Have fun playing! SHIPPING: ---------------- _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 2000 g without insurance: Germany: EUR 4,30 Europe: EUR 8,60 US/Canada: EUR 12,90 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; up to 5 kg with insurance
